parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Application.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Application.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the Application.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the application.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the application.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationSourceConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration for where the application should be loaded from.

nested_items.name: ExternalUrlConfig
nested_items.description: The external URL source for the application.

nested_items.name: AccessUrl
nested_items.description: The URL to access the application.

nested_items.name: ApprovedOrigins
nested_items.description: Additional URLs to allow list if different than the access URL.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Subscriptions
nested_items.description: The events that the application subscribes.

nested_items.name: Event
nested_items.description: The name of the subscription.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the subscription.

nested_items.name: Publications
nested_items.description: The events that the application publishes.

nested_items.name: Event
nested_items.description: The name of the publication.

nested_items.name: Schema
nested_items.description: The JSON schema of the publication event.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the publication.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The created time of the Application.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last modified time of the Application.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: The configuration of events or requests that the application has access to.
(string) ---
